name: Mindscaper
description:
Mindscaper is a  rogue-like beat 'em up where you explore a person’s consciousness as if it were a dungeon. You play as someone trying to understand their own mind and attempt to bring order.

Credits

Music - https://arcofdream.itch.io/monolith-ost

Models - https://devilsworkshop.itch.io/low-poly-3d-and-pixel-2d-rpg-game-assets

VFX - https://highpixellabs.itch.io/unity-hit-vfx-volume-2
